nodes.text: Padawan's traps were artifacts of the Jedi Order that were kept within the Jedi monastery on Al'doleem.

During Jedi Master Kirak Infil'a's exile on Al'doleem, several Padawan's traps were stored at the facility. Padawan's traps could be elevated into the sky with the help of telekinesis, which required considerable effort and distraction during fights. Infil'a could simultaneously collect four Padawan's traps and fight with the training droid Arex stationed at the monastery.
